data.title: Livonia Public Schools
data.text:
Elementary-aged students who demonstrate advanced academic achievement and ability may benefit from a specialized program. Livonia Public Schools has a program dedicated to providing gifted and talented students with a nurturing environment where a rigorous curriculum and social emotional learning form the foundations of this unique environment. Students have opportunities for essential interaction with peers who exhibit similar abilities, interests, and talents.

The program is called ACAT (Alternative Classrooms for the Academically Talented) and is offered in grades 1-6. The program is housed at Webster Elementary School, 32401 Pembroke, Livonia 48152. The ACAT program has been serving students and families in Livonia for 46 years.

The Alternative Classrooms for the Academically Talented (ACAT) School of Choice application opens 4/2/24 and closes 4/22/24 at 11:59 pm.
